data.name: Fractal Space
data.detailed_description:
Feature List

Works perfectly with Xbox 360, Xbox One, DualShock 4 gamepads and Steam Controller!


Steam Greenlight

This game has been Greenlit


About the Game

What are you really trying to escape?

KEY FEATURES

  • Control your Jetpack to fly freely around space!
  • Use your Taser-Gun to activate switches remotely
  • Solve amazing puzzles involving Zero-Gravity rooms
  • Bend time around you to complete seemingly impossible challenges
  • Find Upgrade Stations to acquire New Skills
  • Find lost recordings to solve mysteries and learn what lead you to this station
  • Think and act upon the environment
  • Full Gamepad support: Xbox One, Xbox 360, DualShock 4 and Steam Controller

TASER-GUN: PRECISION IS PRECIOUS

Shoot your taser-gun to power-up electric devices remotely. When you're alone in the universe, this weapon is your best friend.

JETPACK: ENJOY FLYING

Defy laws of physics and gravity by firing up your Jetpack to fly freely through space and avoid deadly traps in the station. You cannot risk falling into the void; use it wisely and make sure you have enough fuel to make your jump!

ZERO-GRAVITY

Discover a new way of thinking first person puzzles and solve puzzles in Zero-Gravity rooms!

TIME MANIPULATION

Use your HyperSpeed Skill to slow down time around you, allowing you to focus and survive traps that would be deadly at regular speed!

UPGRADES

Explore the world and find Upgrade Terminals to acquire new Skills and improve your stats! Upgrades are persistent for a New Game+ when the game is completed.

SOLVE BRAIN-ENGAGING PUZZLES

While surviving the adventure through the space station, dexterity is not your only challenge; activate switches, complete 2D minigames, use cubes to reach higher grounds, go through portal teleporters, orient light mirrors, search for clues to guess access codes!

SPACE EXPLORATION AWAITS

Explore and pick up hidden recordings throughout the station - they will help you solve certain puzzles, recall what happened to you and find answers about your past, present and future.
Pick up health and ammunition packs as you explore space to help you get through this adventure.

ACHIEVEMENTS, LEADERBOARDS, TRADING CARDS AND BADGES

Show the entire world what a puzzle mastermind you are by unlocking Achievements, sharing your speed run scores with your friends! Unlock new Steam Badges and Trading Cards as you play and complete the game!

data.short_description: Live the memorable experience of a First-Person Adventure & Puzzle Game! Jump over lasers, avoid terrible moving saws, dodge giant crushers, use your Jetpack and Taser-Gun to think your way through Zero-Gravity puzzles of this mysterious space station.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Italian, Czech, Danish, Polish, Russian, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Nothing short of brilliant in the world of first person exploration and puzzle games”
4.6/5 – PocketMeta

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.7Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD4000 / GeForce GTX 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Compatible with Xbox 360 and Xbox One Gamepads, Steam Controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5000 / GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Compatible with Xbox 360 and Xbox One Gamepads, Steam Controller

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Leopard 10.5.8 or Snow Leopard 10.6.3
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Leopard 10.5.8 or Snow Leopard 10.6.3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
